text: Ngaphandle kwalabo abaya eqenjini phakathi kwenu kanye nalabo okunesivumelwano noma labo abeza kunina, izifuba (izinhliziyo) zabo zizithibe ekulweni nani noma ekulweni nabantu babo futhi ukube uMvelinqangi wayethanda wayezobanika amandla ngaphezu kwenu ngakho-ke babezolwa nani kodwa uma beziqhelelanisa nani bengalwi nani futhi benikhombisa ukuthula okusho ukuthi uMvelinqangi akazange anenzele indlela (yokulwa) nabo
